name: Exp
description: $EXP is the utility token of scholarz ecosystem (skoolverse) and will in future, be key to realize the potential of our ecosystem and play-and-earn and learn-and-earn model. Scholarz is a collection of non-fungible tokens (NFT) based on ERC721 standard living on Ethereum blockchain. Scholarz is a vision for future of education that circles around giving back and empowering others via games, education, and cryptocurrency.
